goal.en: "The course offers laboratories in photonics. Topics include: light source properties, refraction of light, reflection of light, image formation, polarization, diffraction of light, and interferometers."
goal.ch: 基礎工程光學實驗課程內容涵括幾何光學和物理光學及雷射光學等實驗，透過實驗方法去印證所學，誘導學生了解光學現象之因果關係，以培養學生對各種自然現象進行分析與解決的能力。

content.en:
"Experiment 1 Digital camera application
Experimental 2 Measurement for the focal length of lenses and mirrors
Experimental 3 Measurement for prism dispersion and refractive index and observation for beam splitter
Experiment 4 Observation for telescope and microscopic
Experimental 5 Characteristic measurement of light sources
Experiment 6 Polarization experiments
Experiment 7 Interference and diffraction experiments
Experiment 8 Michelson interference experiment
Experimental 9 Fourier optics experiment
Experiment 10 Color control experiment for light source"
content.ch:
"實驗一 數位相機應用實驗
實驗二 透鏡與面鏡焦距測量
實驗三 稜鏡色散、折射率的測量與分光鏡的觀察
實驗四 望遠鏡、顯微鏡與像差的觀察
實驗五 光源的認識與特性的量測
實驗六 光的偏振
實驗七 基本干涉與繞射實驗
實驗八 Michelson 干涉實驗
實驗九 平行擴束與反傅氏光學
實驗十 光源色彩控制實驗"

grading.en: "Attendance10%, Performance in class10%, Experimental report 40%, Final examination40%."
grading.ch: 出席10%、上課表現10%、實驗報告40%、期末實作考40%。
